snippet: Struggling with continuing deficits and a change in leadership in recent years, the Corcoran Gallery of Art's Board of Trustees voted on Monday to explore leaving its imposing Beaux-Arts building at 17th Street and New York Avenue NW in Washington.
abstract: Struggling with continuing deficits and a change in leadership in recent years, the Corcoran Gallery of Art's Board of Trustees voted on Monday to explore leaving its imposing Beaux-Arts building at 17th Street and New York Avenue NW in Washington.

headline.main: Corcoran Gallery Board Votes to Consider a New Home
headline.print_headline: Corcoran Gallery Board Looks Into a New Home
